title: Horror Movie | Ring Of Terror 1961 | by Clark Paylow | Colorized | with subtitles

sources.title: Horror Movie | Ring Of Terror 1961 | by Clark Paylow | Colorized | with subtitles
sources.description:
Some fears never die - 'Ring of Terror' will haunt your dreams.
A medical student named Lewis Moffitt is tasked with stealing a ring from a deceased homeless man as part of a fraternity initiation. His fear of the dead leads him on a terrifying journey filled with supernatural experiences, ultimately revealing a shocking connection between the ring and his own life.

Black & White original version: https://youtu.be/5_rlkRK1Uck


Original title: Ring of Terror (1961)
This film has subtitles in many languages.

Director: Clark L. Paylow
Writer: Lewis Simeon
Stars: George E. Mather, Austin Green, Esther Furst 
Genres: Colorized, Drama, Horror, Psychotronic film, B-Movie


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
02:52 Exploration of inner turmoil and love through mysterious encounters and emotional revelations.
09:30 Exploration of relationships and fears among a group of individuals in a cafe setting.
17:39 Medical students prepare for an upcoming autopsy, discussing their experiences and challenges.
26:10 Exploration of a cadaver in a medical class, showcasing internal organs and muscles.
30:35 A medical dissection, followed by unsettling encounters and upcoming initiation ceremony.
39:29 A chilling childhood nightmare resurfaces during a power outage, leading to a dark confession.
40:54 Exploring the eerie events surrounding three individuals, their unique ideas, and a mysterious disappearance.
46:00 Participants vote for beauty queen, celebrate with party, and face challenges in a competition.
52:32 Exploring fear and mystery in a chilling encounter with a cryptic message.
